example.eg: The surface of the box was smooth and Tim couldn't see where it opened.
example.egtrans: 那个盒子的表面很光滑，所以提姆找不到打开它的地方。

example.eg: To judge by the surface, you would think Helen didn't have a care in the world.
example.egtrans: 光看海伦的外表，你不会认为她有任何烦恼。

example.eg: The little girl sent the stone skimming along the river's surface.
example.egtrans: 小女孩在河面上打水漂。

example.eg: Some truly amazing people have walked the surface of this planet.
example.egtrans: 一些真正了不起的人在这颗行星的表面行走过。

example.eg: The ball disappeared into the lake, then surfaced a few moments later.
example.egtrans: 那颗球掉进了湖里，不一会儿又浮出了水面。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 浮出水面, 升到地面

example.eg: Ned thought he had fixed all the problems with the program, but new ones kept surfacing.
example.egtrans: 内德认为他已经修复了程序的所有问题，不过新的问题层出不穷。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出现, 浮现, 显露

example.eg: The surface appearance of this product is very attractive.
example.egtrans: 这件商品的外表很迷人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 外表的, 外层的, 表面的

example.eg: Surface appearances would lead you to believe Tom and Barbara's marriage is very happy, but they argue all the time behind closed doors.
example.egtrans: 表面现象会让你相信汤姆和芭芭拉的婚姻是美满幸福的，但是关起门来他们总是吵个没完。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 表面的，表面上的，外表的

example.eg: It's midday and Eugene hasn't surfaced yet.
example.egtrans: 日到晌午，尤金还没有起床。

example.eg: Melanie got out some varnish, ready to surface the old table.
example.egtrans: 梅勒妮取出一些清漆，准备要给那张老桌子上漆。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…进行涂层处理, 给…上漆

example.eg: Oliver surfaced the bookcase with a glossy finish.

dsense.name: air-to-surface
dsense.guideword: (weapon: aircraft to land, sea) (此处地既包括陆地，也包括海面。)

example.eg: On the surface, it seemed like a good idea, but when Josh looked into it further, he realised it would never work.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在表面上, 从表面看

example.eg: The rough surface of the old wooden table caught a thread from her silk blouse.
Tiles used on the bathroom and kitchen floors should have a rough service.
The author never manages more than to scratch the surface of life.
Apples have a much smoother surface than oranges do.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 光滑的表面, 丝滑表面

example.eg: Spiders can walk on water because of surface tension.

dsense.name: surface-to-air
dsense.guideword: (able to go from the ground into the air)

example.eg: The launcher fires missiles surface-to-air.

dsense.name: surface-to-surface
dsense.guideword: (able to go from a ground spot to another)

example.eg: The launcher fires missiles surface-to-surface.
She maintains a calm exterior but harbors a lot of anger just under the surface.
The carpenter secured the block of wood to his work surface.
The worktops in the kitchen are easy to clean.
